block.p: Lisa Beth Katz, a daughter of Marion Katz and Dr. Alvin Katz of Tenafly, N.J., was married last evening to Lee Andrew Lazarus, a son of Gloria and Arlie Lazarus of Boca Raton, Fla. Rabbi Steven Pinsky officiated at the Breakers in Palm Beach, Fla.

Mrs. Lazarus is an associate at Bower, Sanger & Futterman, a New York law firm. She graduated from Syracuse University and Hofstra University Law School. She is also the chairwoman of the young professional council of the Strang Cancer Prevention Center, a New York group that raises money for cancer research. Her father is an otolaryngologist in New York and a surgeon director of Manhattan Eye, Ear and Throat Hospital.

Lisa Beth Katz, a daughter of Marion Katz and Dr. Alvin Katz of Tenafly, N.J., was married last evening to Lee Andrew Lazarus, a son of Gloria and Arlie Lazarus of Boca Raton, Fla. Rabbi Steven Pinsky officiated at the Breakers in Palm Beach, Fla.

Mrs. Lazarus is an associate at Bower, Sanger & Futterman, a New York law firm. She graduated from Syracuse University and Hofstra University Law School. She is also the chairwoman of the young professional council of the Strang Cancer Prevention Center, a New York group that raises money for cancer research. Her father is an otolaryngologist in New York and a surgeon director of Manhattan Eye, Ear and Throat Hospital.

Mr. Lazarus is a founder of Advanced Parking Technologies, a New York company, which distributes equipment to parking garages. He graduated from Emory University and received a law degree from Boston University. His father retired as the president of the Jamesway Corporation in Secaucus, N.J., a former chain of discount stores..
